item.title: From Gson to Moshi, what I learned
item.author: Author
item.description: There is no doubt that people are getting away from GSON and I agree with those reasons too. The only advantage GSON has over other parsing libraries is that it takes a really short amount of time to set up. Furthermore, the most important thing is that Moshi is embracing Kotlin support. hljs.initHighlightingOnLoad();First let’s implement the dependency: implementation("com.squareup.moshi:moshi:1.8.0") ```It's not a struggle to migrate to Moshi. It's really Gson look-a-like.
